summary: This is the day I've been most excited about! Fushimi Inari's thousands of torii gates will be incredible to walk through. I'm prepared for the hike and can't wait to see those iconic red tunnels. Kiyomizu-dera's wooden architecture and city views will be amazing, and I'm treating myself to a traditional kaiseki dinner!

activities.description: Fushimi Inari shrine hike - 10,000 torii gates!

highlight: I plan to make meaningful wishes at both temples and really absorb the peaceful, sacred atmosphere of these ancient places! üôè
